languages.text: {n}Хормейстер ничего не отвечает, его потусторонний взор обращен куда-то сквозь вас, вглубь капеллы. Губы беззвучно шепчут одно и то же имя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хормейстер ничего не отвечает, его потусторонний взор обращен куда-то сквозь вас, вглубь капеллы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Weisz says nothing. His otherworldly gaze is directed through you and past you, to a spot further inside the chapel. His lips silently whisper a name over and over.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хормейстер ничего не отвечает, его потусторонний взор обращен куда-то сквозь вас, вглубь капеллы. Губы беззвучно шепчут одно и то же имя.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Weisz no dice nada. Su mirada sobrenatural se dirige hacia ti y más allá, a algún lugar en el interior de la capilla. Sus labios pronuncian un nombre en silencio una y otra vez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz says nothing. His otherworldly gaze is directed through you and past you, to a spot further inside the chapel. His lips silently whisper a name over and over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz no dice nada. Su mirada sobrenatural se dirige hacia ti y más allá, a algún lugar en el interior de la capilla. Sus labios pronuncian un nombre en silencio una y otra vez.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ワイズは何も言わない。男の別世界を見つめるような視線は、こちらを通り抜けて、礼拝堂のさらに奥へと向けられている。男の唇が静かに、何度も何度も同じ名前を囁いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz says nothing. His otherworldly gaze is directed through you and past you, to a spot further inside the chapel. His lips silently whisper a name over and over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ワイズは何も言わない。男の別世界を見つめるような視線は、こちらを通り抜けて、礼拝堂のさらに奥へと向けられている。男の唇が静かに、何度も何度も同じ名前を囁いている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}威茨一言不发，宛如来自异界的目光穿过了你，随后从你身边掠过，看着礼拜堂深处。他的唇边一遍又一遍地低声重复着某个名字。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz says nothing. His otherworldly gaze is directed through you and past you, to a spot further inside the chapel. His lips silently whisper a name over and over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}威茨一言不发，宛如来自异界的目光穿过了你，随后从你身边掠过，看着礼拜堂深处。他的唇边一遍又一遍地低声重复着某个名字。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Weisz sagt nichts. Sein andersweltlicher Blick geht durch dich hindurch, auf einen Punkt tiefer im Inneren der Kapelle. Seine Lippen flüstern immer wieder lautlos einen Namen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz says nothing. His otherworldly gaze is directed through you and past you, to a spot further inside the chapel. His lips silently whisper a name over and over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz sagt nichts. Sein andersweltlicher Blick geht durch dich hindurch, auf einen Punkt tiefer im Inneren der Kapelle. Seine Lippen flüstern immer wieder lautlos einen Namen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Weisz garde le silence. Son regard surnaturel vous traverse pour se poser sur un recoin plus éloigné de la chapelle. Ses lèvres tremblantes articulent silencieusement un nom, encore et encore.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz says nothing. His otherworldly gaze is directed through you and past you, to a spot further inside the chapel. His lips silently whisper a name over and over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Weisz garde le silence. Son regard surnaturel vous traverse pour se poser sur un recoin plus éloigné de la chapelle. Ses lèvres tremblantes articulent silencieusement un nom, encore et encore.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Weisz hiçbir şey söylemiyor. Uhrevi bakışlarını doğruca sana ve şapelin daha derinlerinde yer alan, arkandaki bir noktaya yöneltiyor. Dudaklarından tekrar tekrar aynı ismin fısıltısı dökülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Weisz says nothing. His otherworldly gaze is directed through you and past you, to a spot further inside the chapel. His lips silently whisper a name over and over.{/n}
